text: Mad Max is an Australian media franchise. Mad Max may also refer to: == Movies == *Mad Max (movie), released in 1979 *Mad Max 2, released in 1981 *Mad Max Beyond Thunderdome, released in 1985 *Mad Max: Fury Road, released in 2015 == Related topics == *Mad Max (2015 video game), based on the franchise *Max Rockatansky, the main protagonist of the film series ==People== * Maxime Bernier, nicknamed Mad Max, a Canadian politician * Max Verstappen (born 1997), Dutch race car driver ==Related pages== * * *
title: Mad Max
